channel.title: admin on Samantha Robertson
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Samantha Robertson

item.description: I am a first-year Ph.D. student in EECS at UC Berkeley. I graduated with a B.S. in Mathematical and Computational Science from Stanford University in June 2019. My research interests span applied statistics and machine learning, data visualization, and causal inference, particularly with application to the social sciences and public health. In my free time you might find me at the beach (when it’s sunny), cooking or drawing (when it’s not), and occasionally practising my Tidyverse skills on fun datasets.
